sentences.sContent: Deinonychus, or "terrible claw" after the sickle-shaped talon on each hind foot, stood about 11 feet from head to tail and was a lithe predator.
sentences.sContent_eng: Deinonychus, or "terrible claw" after the sickle-shaped talon on each hind foot, stood about 11 feet from head to tail and was a lithe predator.
sentences.sCn: 这种被称为恐爪龙（Deinonychus）的恐龙后足上存在镰刀般的利爪，从头到尾的身长约为3.3米，是一种非常敏捷的掠食者。

sentences.sContent: Most powerful is the rear talon, the killer claw, that can exert a force capable of cutting through a human wrist (which is why falconers wear thick gloves).
sentences.sContent_eng: Most powerful is the rear talon, the killer claw, that can exert a force capable of cutting through a human wrist (which is why falconers wear thick gloves).
sentences.sCn: 最有力的鹰爪是后边的哪一只，它是一个致命的鹰爪，甚至它能将人的手腕切断(这就是为什么守猎者要戴上厚手套)。

trans.tranOther: a sharp powerful curved nail on the feet of some birds that catch animals for food
